title: Portrait Bust of a Woman with a Large Collar, from Perfect School to Learn How to Draw the Entire Human Body (English translation)
medium: Engraving in black on ivory laid paper
dimensions: Image/sheet, cut within platemark: 17.4 × 12 cm (6 7/8 × 4 3/4 in.)
creditLine: Art Institute of Chicago. Elizabeth Hammond Stickney Collection

thumbnail.alt_text: Engraving of a woman with a wide collar and an intricately braided hairstyle, curls framing her face.
